effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised. Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power. For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised. Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power. For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Power is increased by 100% its original value for every stage any of the user’s stats have been raised. Accuracy, evasion, and lowered stats do not affect this move’s power. For a Pokémon with all five stats modified to +6, this move’s power is 31×.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.
